Job Description:VDOT ITD is looking for a passionate and result oriented individual who will take over a technical Scaled Agile train as Release Train Engineer (RTE) that supports Power Platform Agile processes are being followed, support teams with self-organization, escalate and help resolve impediments, and continuously improve teams / train to maximize value delivery.Candidate should also be able to perform Scrum Master / Project Manager duties as needed.Ideal candidate should be well versed, have led technical projects using Agile methodologies, and be comfortable with autonomously
